item.title: 在美联储关注的就业数据公布前，黄金连涨三天后有所回落
item.description: 黄金在连涨三日后有所回落，周四晚些时候将公布关键的美国就业数据，该数据可能会影响美联储宽松货币政策的前景。【原文：Gold eased after a three-day gain, before pivotal US jobs data due later Thursday that may shape the outlook for the Federal Reserve’s monetary easing path.】

item.title: 西门子称美国已取消对华芯片软件限制
item.description: 西门子股份公司收到美国政府的通知，称华盛顿已解除对中国芯片设计软件的出口限制。【原文：Siemens AG has received a notice from the US government saying that Washington has lifted export restrictions on chip design software for China.】

item.title: 彭博经济公司称美越协议面临中国报复风险
item.description: 据彭博经济公司（Bloomberg Economics）报道，美国和越南之间达成的新贸易协议有可能引发中国的报复措施，因为该协议包括对被视为通过东南亚国家转运的货物征收 40% 的关税。【原文：A new trade deal between the US and Vietnam risks provoking retaliatory steps from China as the accord includes a 40% tariff on goods deemed to be transshipped through the Southeast Asian country, according to Bloomberg Economics.】

item.title: 印尼企业将在低利率环境下扩大债券发行量
item.description: 印尼企业在上半年创下新高的基础上，今年最后六个月将继续发行债券，因为它们面临着一大波到期债务和有利的借贷成本。【原文：Indonesian companies look set to charge ahead with bond issuance in the last six months of the year, building on a record-breaking first half as they face a wave of maturing debt and favorable borrowing costs.】

item.title: 亚洲新兴债券有望吸引海外基金回流
item.description: 得益于当地货币的弹性和地区央行降息的前景，亚洲债券市场可能会再次开始吸引海外投资者。【原文：Asian bond markets may start to attract overseas investors once again thanks to resilient local currencies and the prospect of interest-rate cuts from regional central banks.】

item.title: S&P 公司称澳大利亚服务业活动改善，成本下降
item.description: 据S&P全球公司称，澳大利亚服务业活动在6月份加速，成本通胀走软，使商业信心达到三年多来的最高水平。【原文：Australia’s services sector activity accelerated in June and cost inflation softened, sending business confidence to its highest level in more than three years, according to S&P Global.】

item.title: 市场脉搏调查显示：关税最后期限临近，浸水买家准备出手
item.description: 最新的《市场脉搏》（Markets Pulse）调查显示，即使本月美国贸易协议的最后期限即将到来对股市造成压力，逢低吸纳者也会出手阻止股市下跌。【原文：Even if the run-up to this month’s deadline for US trade deals weighs on stocks, bargain hunters will step in to stem losses, the latest Markets Pulse survey showed.】

item.title: 美国与越南达成贸易协议，提振市场情绪，石油保持升势
item.description: 由于美国与越南达成的贸易协议提振了人们对下周截止日期前将达成更多协议的乐观情绪，石油价格在创下近两周最大涨幅后趋于稳定。【原文：Oil steadied after its biggest gain in almost two weeks, as a US trade deal with Vietnam boosted optimism further agreements will be made by next week’s cutoff.】

item.title: 鲍威尔对其未来保持沉默令特朗普美联储主席人选更加复杂
item.description: 随着唐纳德-特朗普总统及其顾问开始权衡美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔的继任者，他们遇到了一个重大的复杂问题：目前尚不清楚鲍威尔是否会在明年离开美国央行。【原文：As President Donald Trump and his advisers begin weighing replacements for Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell, they’re running into one significant complication: It’s not clear that Powell will leave the US central bank next year.】

item.title: 美国 6 月就业报告将显示特朗普政策带来的压力
item.description: 预测人士预计，随着特朗普政府的贸易和移民政策转变开始留下印记，美国就业月度报告将显示雇佣放缓，失业率将达到 2021 年以来的最高水平。【原文：Forecasters anticipate a monthly report on US employment will show slower hiring and the highest unemployment rate since 2021 as the Trump administration’s trade and immigration policy shifts start to leave an imprint.】

item.title: 玻利维亚八月大选前通胀率飙升至 34 年新高
item.description: 在全国大选之前，美元严重短缺、燃料匮乏和大规模骚乱使玻利维亚的通货膨胀率达到了三十多年来最快的水平。【原文：A crippling dollar shortage, fuel scarcity and mass unrest pushed Bolivia’s inflation rate to its fastest in more than three decades ahead of the nation’s general election.】

item.title: Datadog 将加入 S&P 500，瞻博网络将在被 HPE 收购后退出
item.description: 软件公司Datadog Inc.将于下周加入S&P 500指数，取代最近被惠普企业公司（HP）收购的瞻博网络公司（Juniper Networks Inc.【原文：Software company Datadog Inc. will be added to the S&P 500 index next week, replacing Juniper Networks Inc. after its recent acquisition by Hewlett Packard Enterprise Co.】

item.title: 企业称美国已取消对华乙烷出口规定
item.description: Enterprise Products Partners 公司称，美国政府已经取消了向中国运输乙烷的许可要求，这为向中国港口运输乙烷扫清了道路，无需额外审批。【原文：Enterprise Products Partners said the US government has removed license requirements for shipping ethane to China, clearing the way for deliveries to the country’s ports without additional approvals.】

item.title: 游客消费放缓，日本百货公司股价下跌
item.description: 百货公司曾经是日本股票投资者的宠儿，但在最近的大盘反弹中已经落后，而且由于日元坚挺削弱了游客的消费能力，百货公司可能会进一步落后。【原文：Once the darling of Japanese stock investors, department stores have lagged the recent broad market rally and could fall further behind as a strong yen dents tourist spending power.】

item.title: 贸易协议提振市场情绪，股市触及纪录：市场综述
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示与越南达成贸易协议后，股市触及纪录高位，显示风险情绪趋于稳定。亚洲股票期货变化不大。【原文：Stocks touched a record high in a sign of firming risk sentiment after President Donald Trump said he reached a trade deal with Vietnam. Asian equity futures were little changed.】

item.title: 高盛为 Gray Media 策划高收益债务交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. is leading a potential transaction for Gray Media Inc. to help the company refinance some of its existing debt, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 日本汽车制造商吸收关税可能会加强特朗普的立场
item.description: 日本汽车制造商已在很大程度上承担了美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对汽车进口征收关税的成本，此举可能会削弱这个亚洲国家在 7 月 9 日最后期限到来之前的谈判能力，届时关税将进一步提高。【原文：Japanese carmakers have largely absorbed the cost of US President Donald Trump’s tariffs on auto imports, a move that may undermine the Asian nation’s negotiating power ahead of a July 9 deadline that will see duties rocket even higher.】

item.title: 购车盛宴（可能）已经结束
item.description:
今天的 Big Take 播客：特斯拉、通用汽车和福特汽车第二季度的销量说明了什么？随着特朗普的关税越过终点线，特斯拉、通用汽车和福特汽车第二季度的销量说明了什么？【原文：

On today’s Big Take podcast: What Tesla, GM and Ford Q2 sales say about manufacturing and car prices as Trump’s tariffs cross the finish line.

】

item.title: 斯塔默称里夫斯虽遇挫折仍将留任英国首相
item.description: 英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）表示，瑞秋-里夫斯将继续留任财政大臣，他试图对引发债券抛售的有关其未来的猜测划清界限。【原文：UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer said Rachel Reeves will stay on as Chancellor of the Exchequer, as he sought to draw a line under speculation about her future that sparked a bond selloff.】

item.title: 瓦卡穆埃尔塔：米莱伊希望将阿根廷页岩转化为其连任的动力。
item.description:
阿根廷巴塔哥尼亚的瓦卡穆埃尔塔油田在经历了多年的失败之后，正在增加原油出口。对于这位自由主义总统的计划来说，这是一次至关重要的繁荣。【原文：

El yacimiento de Vaca Muerta, en la Patagonia argentina, está aumentando sus exportaciones de petróleo crudo tras años de partidas en falso. Es un auge vital para los planes del presidente libertario.

】

item.title: 米莱伊正在开发阿根廷的二叠纪，以巩固其改革成果
item.description:
巴塔哥尼亚的瓦卡穆埃尔塔页岩矿床在经历了多年的失败之后，石油出口正在加速。自由主义总统寄希望于这种繁荣。【原文：

Oil exports are ramping up from the Vaca Muerta shale deposit in Patagonia after years of false starts. It’s a boom the libertarian president is counting on.

】

item.title: 日本债券市场面临减发以来首次 30 年期债券销售
item.description: 日本周四拍卖的 30 年期主权债券将成为决策者能否成功平息债务市场动荡的晴雨表。【原文：Japan’s auction of 30-year sovereign notes Thursday is shaping up as a barometer of policymakers’ success in quelling debt-market turmoil that pushed yields on the nation’s super-long bonds to record highs in May.】

item.title: 泽西海岸学校因财产税纠纷威胁破产
item.description: 新泽西州的一个学区在多年的州政府资金削减后威胁要申请破产，与州长菲尔-墨菲（Phil Murphy）政府的摊牌升级。【原文：A New Jersey school district is threatening to file bankruptcy after years of state funding cuts, escalating a showdown with Governor Phil Murphy’s administration.】

item.title: 力拓支持的铝业公司将向加拿大项目投资 11 亿美元
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，力拓集团（Rio Tinto Plc）部分持股的铝制造商 Aluminerie Alouette 正计划投入多达 15 亿加元（11 亿美元）对其位于魁北克北部的设施进行现代化改造。【原文：Aluminerie Alouette, an aluminum maker that’s partially owned by Rio Tinto Plc, is planning to commit as much as C$1.5 billion ($1.1 billion) to modernizing its facilities in northern Quebec, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 作为中型企业的 IPO 替代方案，SPAC 重新受到青睐
item.description: 在被冷落数年之后，特殊目的收购公司再次将自己定位为传统首次公开募股的替代品，为那些在首次股票销售复苏初期被冷落的企业提供机会。【原文：After years out in the cold, special purpose acquisition companies are again positioning themselves as an alternative to traditional initial public offerings for businesses that have been left out of the nascent recovery in first-time stock sales.】

item.title: 富国银行在三年回调后将加大购买 CLO 的力度
item.description: 据知情人士透露，富国银行（Wells Fargo & Co.【原文：Wells Fargo & Co. is ramping up buying top-rated collateralized loan obligations, after largely staying away from the $1.3 trillion market following interest rate hikes in 2022, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 特立尼达旨在通过英国石油公司和伍德赛德公司的项目提高天然气产量
item.description: 特立尼达和多巴哥正在努力扭转天然气生产严重下滑的局面，重振这个加勒比国家的重要出口产业，以促进其经济增长。【原文：Trinidad and Tobago is working to reverse a major slump in gas production and revive a key export industry in the Caribbean nation to boost its economic growth.】

item.title: 澳大利亚考虑在波动中降低超长期债券销售额
item.description: 澳大利亚债务管理机构正在考虑缩减超长期债券的发行量，因为收益率的上升使得融资成本更加昂贵。【原文：Australia’s debt manager is considering scaling back its issuance of ultra-long bonds as rising yields make funding more expensive.】

item.title: 斯塔默危机表明英国仍受债券市场摆布
item.description: 全球债券投资者提醒英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）英国政治的一个残酷事实：市场的判决可能是迅速而严厉的。【原文：Global bond investors reminded Prime Minister Keir Starmer of a harsh truth of British politics: The market’s verdict can be swift and punishing.】

item.title: 在 "风险至上 "的市场中，贝莱德看好美股而非欧洲股市
item.description: 贝莱德投资研究所（BlackRock Investment Institute）的数据显示，随着股市飙升，美国股市是最佳的投资场所，因此先不要放弃 "美国例外论 "的概念。【原文：Don’t write off the notion of “America Exceptionalism” just yet, as the US stock market is the best place to be with equities roaring higher, according to the BlackRock Investment Institute.】
